required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Objective Visual Acuity Measurement Using Suppression of the Optokinetic Nystagmus (OKN).
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Application of Objective Visual Acuity Measurement Using Suppression Method to Inhibit Optokinetic Nystagmus (OKN).

brief_summary.textblock: Suppression of the optokinetic nystagmus when a target is perceived can be applied to assess visual acuity objectively. Our aim is to establish prediction intervals for this optokinetic nystagmus suppression test (Speedwheel Test, SW) so that SW acuity may be used to estimate Snellen acuity (FrACT- C and -E) in the clinic in adults and children unable to cooperate in other acuity testing.

detailed_description.textblock: In this prospective single center study subjects aged at least 4 years underwent testing of visual acuity with SW, Landolt-C and Tumbling-E symbols (Freiburg acuity test: FrACT-C, FrACT-E). Prediction intervals are to be established for SW compared to FrACT-C or -E and for FrACT- E compared to FrACT-C.

primary_outcome.measure: Prediction intervals of Snellen acuity for the SW
primary_outcome.description: Prediction intervals of Snellen acuity for the SW compared to Landolt C and E symbols

secondary_outcome.measure: Prediction intervals of Snellen acuity for Landolt C compared to E symbols
secondary_outcome.description: Prediction intervals of Snellen acuity for Landolt C compared to E symbols

intervention.intervention_name: Visual acuity testing with SW , Landolt-"C" and Tumbling-"E" symbols
intervention.description: Establish prediction intervals for acuity tests

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- able and willing to perform the test
Exclusion Criteria:
- under 4 years of age
- unable or unwilling

overall_official.affiliation: University Basel, University Eye Hospital Basel

facility.name: University Basel, University Eye Hospital Basel

reference.citation: Schwob N, Palmowski-Wolfe A. Objective measurement of visual acuity by optokinetic nystagmus suppression in children and adult patients. J AAPOS. 2019 Oct;23(5):272.e1-272.e6. doi: 10.1016/j.jaapos.2019.05.016. Epub 2019 Sep 14.

Schwob N, Palmowski-Wolfe A. Establishing an Objective Measurement of Visual Acuity with a Computerised Optokinetic Nystagmus Suppression Test. Klin Monbl Augenheilkd. 2020 Apr;237(4):502-505. doi: 10.1055/a-1119-6123. Epub 2020 Apr 24.

patient_data.ipd_description: The results are to be shared in a publication
